    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddProductHandler
    Handles the process of displaying and processing the form for adding a new product.
    Address
    Represents a postal address consisting of address lines, country, and postal code.
    AdminPanelHandler
    Handles HTTP requests for the admin panel, providing a page for managing home appliances.
    AppliancesHTTP
    Handles HTTP requests for displaying home appliances in a store.
    BasketHandler
    Handles HTTP requests related to the shopping basket in the application.
    Controller
    The Controller class serves as the main entry point for the Home Appliance Store application.
    Customer
    The Customer class represents a customer entity with details such as their ID, business name, address, telephone number, and email.
    CustomerDAO
    The CustomerDAO class provides CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for the Customer entity in the database.
    CustomerHandler
    The CustomerHandler class handles HTTP requests to display a list of customers.
    DeleteProductHandler
    The DeleteProductHandler class handles HTTP requests for deleting products.
    EditProductHandler
    The EditProductHandler class is responsible for handling HTTP requests related to editing product details in an ecommerce application.
    HomeAppliance
    The HomeAppliance class represents an appliance in a home appliance store.
    HomeApplianceDAO
    The HomeApplianceDAO class is responsible for interacting with the SQLite database to perform CRUD operations on the appliance data.
    LoginHandler
    The LoginHandler class handles user login requests, providing functionality for displaying a login form, processing login credentials, and authenticating users against a SQLite database.
    LogoutHandler
    The LogoutHandler class handles user logout requests.
    PasswordHasher
    The PasswordHasher class provides functionality to hash existing user passwords in the database.
    RootHandler
    The RootHandler class is responsible for setting up an HTTP server and handling various routes for displaying products, customers, admin panel, and managing user login/logout.
    ShoppingBasket
    Represents a shopping basket that holds a list of home appliances.
    UserInserter
    The UserInserter class provides functionality for inserting a new user into the database with a hashed password.
